data.name: APPTEXT
data.value: This is my first application wrote using c# and .NET WPF Framework. I had an idea when i was work in insurance company, it was supposed to be a tool for creating insurance offers in the form of an e-mail. But in this time i couldn`t do that because i didn`t know Any programming language. When i started my adventure with programming i thought i can write this app as my Project, and train myself programming skills aswell.

data.name: ASPTEXT
data.value: In my opnion natural thing in learning .NET was start with new technology, and it fell on ASP.NET MVC. My motivation to leatn this Framework was wilingness to improve my skills by new Framework and desire to learn something about what so much is said and wrote in the Web. My adventure with this technology i started from make login window till site views. I used to html, bootstrap, css3 i must say that mvc made big impression on me. although I only got to know this technology a little bit. To write this site i used to information found in the Web, especially in stacoverflow. Now it’s time to read some books or use some course to complete knowledge about ASP.NET MVC.

data.name: BOOTTEXT
data.value: I can’t to tell You i know this Framework in 100%, but im using it freely. I know rules responsible for responsive, arrangement sites, and other basics functions of this Framework. As with privious ones i don’t have too much experience with this Framework, but i can’t tell my skills are very low. I’ve made few sites with using Bootstrap, and when i have problem i try serach a solution in the Web.

data.name: CONTACTTEXT
data.value: if you are interested in starting cooperation with me, write email or call me, please. For your convenience, I also provide skype and whatsapp.

data.name: COOKIE
data.value: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

data.name: CSHARP1
data.value: I started with C# In Feburary 2018 as totally newbie, and till now i’ve mastered strongbasics. In this whole time i learned form books, did college and

data.name: CSHARP2
data.value: tasks I also used aids such as games for coders:

data.name: CSHARP3
data.value: The above aids let me master C# to the extent that it Allows me to write my own program In .NET WPF Framework and next step was Web application with ASP.NET MVC.

data.name: CSSTEXT
data.value: I always using CSS3 when creating websites, but when i was seen it for first time it was for me like a magic book wrote in foreign language. Fortunately, it didn’t last long. Unfortunately, due to the fact that i do not use it too of ten i don’t have high skills in CSS3. But when i need to write something i can do it, sometimes im using Google or StackOverflow.

data.name: EUROMAXTEXT
data.value: It`s a Simple site made by me for my friend`s request, which had a construction company. Layout and graphics is made by myself. The only one element which doesen`t mine, and i used it in constructing this site is fancybox in galery.

data.name: FOUNDATION
data.value: Foundation sport in Bytom - Hostel Bytom

data.name: GITTEXT
data.value: GIT, version system control. I do not know this tool very well, but I'm learning it. The problem is that I do not have any experience with GIT, especially in team work with him. Currently, I learn everything about programming myself and I have no opportunity to practice with GIT.

data.name: HOBBYTEXT
data.value: Astronomy, scientific programs, programming, games (mmorpg, fpp, rpg, rts, board games).

data.name: HTMLTEXT
data.value: This language i use at my primary school, which i attended in 90’s. I’ve made a lot pages in html, unfortunately, only two have survived to this Day. This sites are Projects for Szlips and Euromax. My first proffesional site was made in 98’s for IT Olympiad, where i took third place. At this time, i always makeing sites for my friends, and company which asks me for make site.

data.name: LETSCSSTEXT
data.value: Project made in accordance with the workshops organized in Katowice by Coders Lab company. It's my first project in CSS where im using an animation and i think it went not bad, aswell. 90% of this project was made as homework by me.

data.name: LOGINPAGETEXTMAIN
data.value: This site is made in ASP.NET MVC technology, and supported by Bootstrap Framework plus CSS3. I’ve made it to present my skills, therefore later You can find some Projects made by me, and more informations about me.

data.name: LOGINPAGETEXTSECONDARY
data.value: Login and Password were given in CV, because i didn’t want give acces for anyone, but Orly for recruiters.

data.name: MAURFIELD1
data.value: Maintaining contact with the entrusted client,

data.name: SILESIAN
data.value: Silesian University of Technology in Katowice

data.name: SQLTEXT
data.value: SQL – some time ago that was mystic item for me, i knew only it`s database. However i decided to learn a Little about this, at start i watch on youtube tutorial on

data.name: SQLTEXT1
data.value: channel, there Mr Mirosław explain a basics of SQL. Next i installed XAMPP and i trained a Little at localhost, thanks to this i mastered basics like selekt, from, delete, update, truncate etc... plus i learned how to use myphpadmin. Later i thought i should use this skills in practice and i made login window in my mvc Project. I`ve made database on MSSQL in webio.pl service, and it wasn`t hard, but before i did it im trying make the same on MYSQL and it was too much work to do it, so i decided to use MSSQL as simpler solution.

data.name: STUDYTOPIC
data.value: Development of the results of thermal and mechanical fatigue tests based on steel: X20CrMoV12.1, P91 and P92.

data.name: SZLIPSTEXT
data.value: I’ve made this site for company where i was working, for my previous employer. I started makeing this site because of my friend's request but i wanted to learn Bootstrap Framework aswell. It was my first time when i’ve seen this tool and i liked it. Layout, graphics and idea are mine, only some solutions are implemented thanks to JQery templates reworked by me. Very helpful was stackoverflow.

data.name: VISUALTEXT
data.value: Visual studio 2017, You need this program if You want to write some application, so it`s big deal, i thought when i was installing it on my hard drive. Why i choose this program, not any other accessible on market? Because my friend said to me it`s good tool, and secondo reason was it`s compilator made by Microsoft, as entire .NET. First steps wasn`t easy but as i told earlier – if You want to learn something, do it. You can do it more or less, but You can do it. I know that VS is a big tool, and i don’t know all functions of this program, but all functions what i needed i learned: debbuger, snippet, keyboard shortcuts, and many more.

data.name: WPFTEXT
data.value: in the third month of my studdy, the time has come for my first application where i used .NET WPF Framework. At start i didn’t know how to start with this Framework, because it was something completly new for me, but after The first week i had first draft of my application. Next i’ve made some upgreads and had completly working application.
